data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 544,300 souls in Sarangani and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sarangani, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sarangani. Through your servants plant 108 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 27 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sarangani, Philippines.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Sarangani, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 75,820 believers living in Sarangani, Philippines.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Molbog people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Molbog people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Molbog people is yours.
Father, we pray that the people of Sarangani, Philippines will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 544,300 people living in Sarangani through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Sarangani to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Sarangani
location.people_groups_list: Sangil, Maguindanao, Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama, Iranun, Sindhi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sangil (9,700), Maguindanao (1,304,000), Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama (99,000), Iranun (264,000), Sindhi (31,000)
